fb.datatype
Class COLOR

java.lang.Object
  fb.datatype.ANY
      fb.datatype.COLOR

public class COLOR
extends ANY

Instances of this data type contain an instance of java.awt.Color.

Method Detail

colorNamed

public static java.awt.Color colorNamed(java.lang.String s)
                                 throws FBDataTypeException
Answer the color with the given name.

Parameters:
s - The color name, which must be a valid Java color name, optionally preceded by COLOR#.
Returns:
The named Color.
Throws:
FBDataTypeException - The color name is not valid.

initialize

public void initialize(java.lang.String s)
                throws FBDataTypeException
Initializes the receiver's contained Color from the specified String containing a [red, green, blue] ARRAY representation, e.g., [255,0,0] or from a recognized color name, e.g., COLOR#RED or color#red.

Specified by:
initialize in class ANY
Parameters:
s - The initialization string.
Throws:
FBDataTypeException - NULL_OBJECT or INVALID_OBJECT.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
